`documents/Test_docs/Hall/src/default/HallInfo.java.html`:

```html
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="zh"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../../.resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>HallInfo.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../../../.resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="right"><a href="../../../.sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../../../index.html" class="el_report">HallInfoTest (2013-12-14 14:40:45)</a> &gt; <a href="../../index.html" class="el_group">Hall</a> &gt; <a href="../index.html" class="el_bundle">src</a> &gt; <a href="index.html" class="el_package">default</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">HallInfo.java</span></div><h1>HallInfo.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.net.*;
import net.sf.json.*;

/**.
 * 游戏大厅类。由于只有一个大厅，所以它是单件模式。
 */
public class HallInfo {
	/**.
	 * 该大厅内的房间。
	 */	
	private Room rooms[];

	/**.
	 * 该大厅内的用户以及他们的信息。
	 * 格式为：{&quot;username1&quot;:{...}, &quot;username2&quot;:{...}}
	 * 其中省略部分为一个用户的信息，包括：
	 * 		int room 			表示所在房间号，-1表示不在房间中
	 * 		int pos   			表示所在座位号，-1表示不在座位中
	 * 		String ready		表示当前是否准备，只可能是&quot;ready&quot; 或 &quot;unready&quot;
	 * 		JSONObject details	表示用户资料
	 * 之后再提到用户信息，请参考这个说明
	 */	
	private JSONObject users;

	/**.
	 * 该大厅内的玩家操作记录，包括进入/离开大厅，进入/离开房间，准备/取消准备。
	 * 大厅内的事件从0开始顺序编号，事件编号对应着事件在events中的下标。事件的编号在后面还会用到。
	 */	
	private JSONArray events;

	/**.
	 * 大厅的构造函数，主要任务是为每个房间创造实例。
	 */
<span class="fc" id="L36">	private HallInfo() {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L37">		events = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">		users = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L39">		rooms = new Room[Constant.HALL_LIMIT];</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L40" title="All 2 branches covered.">		for (int i = 0; i &lt; rooms.length; i++) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L41">			rooms[i] = new Room(i);</span>
		}		
<span class="fc" id="L43">	}</span>
	
<span class="fc" id="L45">	private static HallInfo hall = null;</span>

	public static HallInfo getInstance() {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L48" title="All 2 branches covered.">		if (hall == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L49">			hall = new HallInfo();</span>
		}
<span class="fc" id="L51">		return hall;</span>
	}

	public static void clear()
	{
<span class="fc bfc" id="L56" title="All 2 branches covered.">		if (hall != null)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L57">			hall = new HallInfo();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L58">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 通过该函数，可以得到大厅当前的状态。
	 * 返回的字典包括：
	 * 		1）users  大厅内所有用户的信息
	 * 		2）rooms  大厅内所有房间是否开始游戏
	 * 		3）count  截止到现在，大厅内发生过的事件数量
	 */
	public JSONObject getStatus() throws Exception {
<span class="pc" id="L68">		synchronized (this) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L69">			JSONObject ans = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L70">			ans.put(&quot;users&quot;, users);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L71">			ans.put(&quot;rooms&quot;, getRoomStage());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L72">			ans.put(&quot;count&quot;, events.size());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L73">			return ans;</span>
		}
	}

	/**.
	 * 通过该函数，可以得到最近一段时间大厅发生的变化。
	 * 返回的字典包括：
	 * 		1）events 编号从now开始到现在为止大厅内发生的事件。
	 * 		2）rooms  大厅内所有房间是否开始游戏
	 * 		3）count  截止到现在，大厅内发生过的事件数量
	 */
	public JSONObject getEvents(int now) throws Exception {
<span class="pc" id="L85">		synchronized (this) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L86">			int n = events.size();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L87">			JSONArray result = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L88" title="All 2 branches covered.">			for (int i = now; i &lt; n; i++) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L89">				result.add(events.getJSONObject(i));</span>
			}
<span class="fc" id="L91">			JSONObject ans = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L92">			ans.put(&quot;count&quot;, n);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L93">			ans.put(&quot;events&quot;, result);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L94">			ans.put(&quot;rooms&quot;, getRoomStage());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L95">			return ans;</span>
		}
	}

	/**.
	 * 通过该函数，可以得到一个用户的信息。传入参数user为该用户的用户名。
	 */	
	public JSONObject getDetails(String user) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L103">		synchronized (this) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L104">			return users.getJSONObject(user).getJSONObject(&quot;details&quot;);</span>
		}
	}
	
	/**.
	 * 通过这个函数，获取一个用户最近的聊天信息
	 */	
	public JSONArray getMessages(String user) throws Exception{
<span class="fc bfc" id="L112" title="All 2 branches covered.">		if (!users.has(user)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L113">			return new JSONArray();</span>
		}
		
<span class="fc" id="L116">		int room = users.getJSONObject(user).getInt(&quot;room&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L117">		int pos = users.getJSONObject(user).getInt(&quot;pos&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L118" title="All 2 branches covered.">		if (room &gt; -1) {</span>
<span class="pc" id="L119">			synchronized (this){</span>
<span class="fc" id="L120">				return rooms[room].getMessages(pos);</span>
			}
		} else {
<span class="fc" id="L123">			return new JSONArray();</span>
		}
	}	

	/**.
	 * 通过该函数，可以执行一个用户的操作。传入的字典query必须包含type和user，表示用户和操作种类。
	 * 操作种类包括：
	 * 		1）login  	表示进入大厅，需要同时传入details
	 * 		2）enter  	表示进入房间，需要同时传入room与pos表示房间号和座位号
	 * 		3）leave  	表示离开房间
	 * 		4）ready  	表示准备
	 * 		5）unready 	表示取消准备
	 * 		6）message	表示在房间中说一句话，需要同时传入message
	 * 对于每个操作：
	 * 		1） 若格式非法，则会抛出异常
	 * 		2） 若格式合法，但操作行为不合法（例如不在房间但要求离开房间），则什么都不会做，并返回false
	 * 		3） 若格式合法，行为也合法，则会进行该操作，并返回true
	 */	
	public boolean execute(JSONObject query) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L142">		synchronized (this) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L143">			String type = query.getString(&quot;type&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L144">			String user = query.getString(&quot;user&quot;);</span>
						
<span class="fc bfc" id="L146" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (type.equals(&quot;login&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L147" title="All 2 branches covered.">				if (!query.has(&quot;details&quot;)) throw new Exception();</span>
				
<span class="fc bfc" id="L149" title="All 2 branches covered.">				if (!users.has(user)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L150">					users.put(user, newUser(query.getJSONObject(&quot;details&quot;)));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L151">					events.add(query);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L152">					return true;</span>
				} else {
<span class="fc" id="L154">					return false;</span>
				}
			}
			
<span class="fc bfc" id="L158" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (!users.has(user)) return false;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L159">			JSONObject userData = users.getJSONObject(user);</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L161" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (type.equals(&quot;enter&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L162">				int room = query.getInt(&quot;room&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L163">				int pos = query.getInt(&quot;pos&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L165" title="All 2 branches covered.">				if (room == 999) {</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L166" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">					for (int i = 0; i &lt; rooms.length; i++)</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L167" title="All 2 branches covered.">						if (rooms[i].getEmpty() &gt; -1) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L168">							room = i;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L169">							pos = rooms[i].getEmpty();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L170">							break;</span>
						}
				}
<span class="fc bfc" id="L173" title="All 4 branches covered.">				if (room &gt;= Constant.HALL_LIMIT || room &lt; 0) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L174">					return false;</span>
				}

<span class="fc bfc" id="L177" title="All 2 branches covered.">				if (pos == 999)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L178">					pos = rooms[room].getEmpty();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L179" title="All 4 branches covered.">				if (pos &gt;= Constant.ROOM_LIMIT || pos &lt; 0) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L180">					return false;</span>
				}
				
<span class="pc bpc" id="L183" title="1 of 6 branches missed.">				if (userData.getInt(&quot;room&quot;) == -1 &amp;&amp; rooms[room].getStatus(pos) == Room.EMPTY &amp;&amp; rooms[room].getStage() == Room.WAITING)</span>
				{
<span class="fc" id="L185">					userData.put(&quot;room&quot;, room);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L186">					userData.put(&quot;pos&quot;, pos);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L187">					rooms[room].enter(pos, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L188">					query.put(&quot;room&quot;, room);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L189">					query.put(&quot;pos&quot;, pos);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L190">					events.add(query);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L191">					return true;</span>
				} else {
<span class="fc" id="L193">					return false;</span>
				}
			}

<span class="fc" id="L197">			int room = userData.getInt(&quot;room&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L198">			int pos = userData.getInt(&quot;pos&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L199" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (room == -1) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L200">				return false;</span>
			}

<span class="fc" id="L203">			Room userRoom = rooms[room];</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L205" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (type.equals(&quot;message&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L206" title="All 2 branches covered.">				if (!query.has(&quot;message&quot;)) throw new Exception();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L207">				String message = query.getString(&quot;message&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L208">				userRoom.addMessage(pos, message);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L209">				return true;</span>
			}

<span class="fc bfc" id="L212" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (type.equals(&quot;leave&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L213">				userData.put(&quot;room&quot;, -1);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L214">				userData.put(&quot;pos&quot;, -1);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L215">				userData.put(&quot;ready&quot;, &quot;unready&quot;);					</span>
<span class="fc" id="L216">				userRoom.leave(pos);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L217">				events.add(query);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L218">				return true;</span>
			}

<span class="fc bfc" id="L221" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (type.equals(&quot;ready&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L222" title="All 2 branches covered.">				if (userRoom.getStatus(pos) == Room.UNREADY) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L223">					userData.put(&quot;ready&quot;, &quot;ready&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L224">					userRoom.ready(pos);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L225">					events.add(query);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L226" title="All 2 branches covered.">					if (userRoom.isReady()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L227">						start(userRoom);</span>
					}
<span class="fc" id="L229">					return true;</span>
				} else {
<span class="fc" id="L231">					return false;</span>
				}
			}

<span class="fc bfc" id="L235" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (type.equals(&quot;unready&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L236" title="All 2 branches covered.">				if (userRoom.getStatus(pos) == Room.READY) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L237">					userData.put(&quot;ready&quot;, &quot;unready&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L238">					userRoom.unready(pos);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L239">					events.add(query);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L240">					return true;</span>
				} else {
<span class="fc" id="L242">					return false;</span>
				}
			}
			
<span class="fc" id="L246">			return false;</span>
		}
	}	

	/**.
	 * 通过该函数，执行一个用户离开大厅的操作。
	 */	
	public boolean logout(String user) throws Exception {
<span class="pc" id="L254">		synchronized (this) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L255" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (users.has(user)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L256">				JSONObject data = users.getJSONObject(user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L257">				int room = data.getInt(&quot;room&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L258">				int pos = data.getInt(&quot;pos&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L259" title="All 2 branches covered.">				if (room &gt; -1) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L260">					rooms[room].leave(pos);</span>
				}
<span class="fc" id="L262">				users.remove(user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L263">				JSONObject query = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L264">				query.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L265">				query.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;logout&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L266">				events.add(query);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L267">				return true;</span>
			} else {
<span class="fc" id="L269">				return false;</span>
			}
		}
	}
	
	/**.
	 * 通过这个函数，设置一局游戏开始的信息
	 */	
	public void setGameStartInfo(int id, JSONArray infos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L278">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L279" title="All 2 branches covered.">		for (int i = 0; i &lt; infos.size(); i++) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L280">			JSONObject info = infos.getJSONObject(i);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L281">			data.put(info.getString(&quot;user&quot;), info);</span>
		}
<span class="pc" id="L283">		synchronized (this) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L284">			Room room = rooms[id];</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L285" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">			if (room.getStage() == Room.ALLREADY) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L286" title="All 2 branches covered.">				for (int i = 0; i &lt; Constant.ROOM_LIMIT; i++) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L287" title="All 2 branches covered.">					if (room.getStatus(i) != Room.EMPTY) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L288">						String user = room.getUser(i);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L289">						room.setAddr(i, data.getJSONObject(user).getString(&quot;ip&quot;), data.getJSONObject(user).getInt(&quot;port&quot;));</span>
					}
				}
<span class="fc" id="L292">				room.setStage(Room.PLAYING);</span>
			}
		}
<span class="fc" id="L295">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 通过这个函数，查询一个用户是否开始游戏
	 */	
	public JSONObject getGameStartInfo(String user) throws Exception {
<span class="pc" id="L301">		synchronized (this) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L302" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (!users.has(user)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L303">				return null;</span>
			}
<span class="fc" id="L305">			int room = users.getJSONObject(user).getInt(&quot;room&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L306">			int pos = users.getJSONObject(user).getInt(&quot;pos&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L307" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (room &gt; -1) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L308">				Room userRoom = rooms[room];</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L309" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">				if (userRoom.getStage() == Room.PLAYING &amp;&amp; userRoom.getStatus(pos) == Room.READY) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L310">					userRoom.unready(pos);</span>
					
<span class="fc" id="L312">					JSONObject result = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L313">					result.put(&quot;key&quot;, userRoom.getKey(pos));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L314">					result.put(&quot;ip&quot;, userRoom.getIp(pos));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L315">					result.put(&quot;port&quot;, userRoom.getPort(pos));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L316">					return result;</span>
				}				
			}
		}
<span class="fc" id="L320">		return null;</span>
	}

	/**.
	 * 通过这个函数，设置一局游戏结束的信息
	 */	
	public void setGameFinishedInfo(int id, JSONArray infos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L327">		Room room = rooms[id];</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L328" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">		if (room.getStage() == Room.PLAYING) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L329">			room.setStage(Room.WAITING);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L330" title="All 2 branches covered.">			for (int i = 0; i &lt; infos.size(); i++) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L331">				JSONObject info = infos.getJSONObject(i);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L332">				String user = info.getString(&quot;user&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L333">				String result = info.getString(&quot;result&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc" id="L334">				synchronized(this) {</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L335" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">			        if (users.has(user)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L336">		        		JSONObject userInfo = users.getJSONObject(user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L337">	        			userInfo.put(&quot;ready&quot;, &quot;unready&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L338">        				JSONObject details = userInfo.getJSONObject(&quot;details&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L339">    					details.put(&quot;exp&quot;, Constant.getExp(details.getInt(&quot;exp&quot;), result));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L340">				        details.put(&quot;level&quot;, Constant.getLevel(details.getInt(&quot;exp&quot;)));</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L341" title="All 2 branches covered.">			        	if (result.equals(&quot;win&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L342">		        			details.put(&quot;success&quot;, details.getInt(&quot;success&quot;) + 1);</span>
	        			}
<span class="fc bfc" id="L344" title="All 2 branches covered.">        				if (result.equals(&quot;lose&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L345">					        details.put(&quot;fail&quot;, details.getInt(&quot;fail&quot;) + 1);</span>
				        }
<span class="fc bfc" id="L347" title="All 2 branches covered.">			        	if (result.equals(&quot;break&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L348">					        details.put(&quot;break&quot;, details.getInt(&quot;break&quot;) + 1);</span>
				        }
						//JSONObject unready = new JSONObject();
						//unready.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);
						//unready.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;unready&quot;);
						//events.add(unready);

<span class="fc" id="L355">						JSONObject refresh = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L356">						refresh.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L357">						refresh.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;refresh&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L358">						refresh.put(&quot;details&quot;, details);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L359">				        events.add(refresh);</span>
			        }
		        }
			}
		}
<span class="fc" id="L364">	}</span>
		
	private void start(Room room) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L367">		room.setStage(Room.ALLREADY);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L369">		JSONArray infos = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L370" title="All 2 branches covered.">		for (int i = 0; i &lt; Constant.ROOM_LIMIT; i++) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L371" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (room.getStatus(i) != Room.EMPTY) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L372">				String user = room.getUser(i);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L373">				String key = Constant.getKey();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L374">				room.setKey(i, key);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L375">				JSONObject details = users.getJSONObject(user).getJSONObject(&quot;details&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L377">				JSONObject info = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L378">				info.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L379">				info.put(&quot;key&quot;, key);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L380">				info.put(&quot;details&quot;, details);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L381">				infos.add(info);</span>
			}
		}
<span class="fc" id="L384">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L385">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;ready&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L386">		data.put(&quot;id&quot;, room.getNum());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L387">		data.put(&quot;users&quot;, infos);</span>
		
<span class="fc" id="L389">		GameTalk gameTalk = GameTalk.getInstance();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L390" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">		if (gameTalk == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L391">			Log.log(&quot;Not find GameServer!&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L392">		} else {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L393">			gameTalk.send(data.toString());</span>
		}
<span class="fc" id="L395">	}</span>
	
	private JSONObject newUser(JSONObject details) {
<span class="fc" id="L398">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L399">		data.put(&quot;room&quot;, -1);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L400">		data.put(&quot;pos&quot;, -1);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L401">		data.put(&quot;ready&quot;, &quot;unready&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L402">		data.put(&quot;details&quot;, details);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L403">		return data;</span>
	}

	private JSONArray getRoomStage() {
<span class="fc" id="L407">		JSONArray stages = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L408" title="All 2 branches covered.">		for (int i = 0; i &lt; rooms.length; i++) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L409">			int stage = rooms[i].getStage();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L410" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (stage == Room.WAITING) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L411">				stages.add(0);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L412">			} else {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L413">				stages.add(1);</span>
			}
		}
<span class="fc" id="L416">		return stages;</span>
	}
}
```

```html
	/**.

<span class="pc" id="L103">		} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L104">			fail();			</span>

<span class="pc" id="L113">		} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L114">			fail();			</span>

<span class="fc" id="L117">		HallInfo.clear();</span>

	/**.

	/**.
	 * 测试用户取消准备函数

	 * 应返回true

	@Test
	public void testExecuteUnreadySuccess() {
<span class="fc" id="L351">		HallInfo.clear();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L352">		HallInfo hall = HallInfo.getInstance();</span>
		try {
<span class="fc" id="L354">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L355">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname&quot;, 1, 1));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L356">			hall.execute(getCorrectReadyData(&quot;testname&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L357">			boolean flag = hall.execute(getCorrectUnreadyData(&quot;testname&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L358">			assertEquals(flag, true);</span>
<span class="pc" id="L359">		} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L360">			fail();			</span>
		}
<span class="fc" id="L362">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 测试设置游戏开始信息
	 * 给定参数合法
	 * 过获取游戏房间状态验证正确性，对应房间的状态应变为Playing
	 */
	@Test
	public void testSetGameStartInfo() {
<span class="fc" id="L655">		HallInfo.clear();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L656">		HallInfo hall = HallInfo.getInstance();</span>

		try {
<span class="fc" id="L659">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname1&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L660">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname1&quot;, 1, 0));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L661">			hall.execute(getCorrectReadyData(&quot;testname1&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L662">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname2&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L663">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname2&quot;, 1, 1));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L664">			hall.execute(getCorrectReadyData(&quot;testname2&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L665">			JSONArray infos = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L666">			infos.add(getCorrectGameStartInfo(&quot;testname1&quot;, &quot;1.2.3.4&quot;, 10001));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L667">			infos.add(getCorrectGameStartInfo(&quot;testname2&quot;, &quot;1.2.3.4&quot;, 10002));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L668">			hall.setGameStartInfo(1, infos);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L669">			JSONObject status = hall.getStatus();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L670">			JSONArray rooms = status.getJSONArray(&quot;rooms&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L671">			assertEquals(rooms.get(1), 1);</span>
<span class="pc" id="L672">		} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L673">			fail();</span>
		}
<span class="fc" id="L675">	}</span>
	
	/**.
	 * 测试获取游戏开始信息
	 * 参数分为以下三类：
	 * 		1）该用户的房间已经准备好游戏，应返回游戏开始信息
	 * 		2）该用户的房间还没有准备好游戏，应返回空
	 * 		3）该用户不在房间中，应返回空
	 * 		4）该用户不在大厅中，应返回空
	 */
	@Test
	public void testGetGameStartInfo() {
<span class="fc" id="L687">		HallInfo.clear();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L688">		HallInfo hall = HallInfo.getInstance();</span>

		try {
<span class="fc" id="L691">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname1&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L692">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname1&quot;, 1, 0));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L693">			hall.execute(getCorrectReadyData(&quot;testname1&quot;));</span>

<span class="fc" id="L695">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname2&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L696">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname2&quot;, 1, 1));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L697">			hall.execute(getCorrectReadyData(&quot;testname2&quot;));</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L699">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname3&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L700">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname3&quot;, 2, 0));</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L702">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname4&quot;));			</span>
<span class="fc" id="L703">			JSONArray infos = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L704">			infos.add(getCorrectGameStartInfo(&quot;testname1&quot;, &quot;1.2.3.4&quot;, 10001));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L705">			infos.add(getCorrectGameStartInfo(&quot;testname2&quot;, &quot;1.2.3.4&quot;, 10002));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L706">			hall.setGameStartInfo(1, infos);</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L708">			JSONObject info1 = hall.getGameStartInfo(&quot;testname2&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L709" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">			assertEquals(info1 != null, true);</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L711">			JSONObject info2 = hall.getGameStartInfo(&quot;testname3&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L712" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">			assertEquals(info2 == null, true);</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L714">			JSONObject info3 = hall.getGameStartInfo(&quot;testname4&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L715" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">			assertEquals(info3 == null, true);</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L717">			JSONObject info4 = hall.getGameStartInfo(&quot;testname5&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L718" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">			assertEquals(info4 == null, true);</span>
<span class="pc" id="L719">		} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L720">			fail();</span>
		}
<span class="fc" id="L722">	}</span>
	
	/**.
	 * 测试设置游戏结果函数
	 */
	@Test
	public void testGetGameFinishInfo() {
<span class="fc" id="L729">		HallInfo.clear();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L730">		HallInfo hall = HallInfo.getInstance();</span>

		try {
<span class="fc" id="L733">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname1&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L734">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname1&quot;, 1, 0));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L735">			hall.execute(getCorrectReadyData(&quot;testname1&quot;));</span>

<span class="fc" id="L737">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname2&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L738">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname2&quot;, 1, 1));</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L740">			hall.execute(getCorrectLoginData(&quot;testname3&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L741">			hall.execute(getCorrectEnterData(&quot;testname3&quot;, 1, 2));</span>

<span class="fc" id="L743">			hall.execute(getCorrectReadyData(&quot;testname2&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L744">			hall.execute(getCorrectReadyData(&quot;testname3&quot;));</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L746">			JSONArray infos = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L747">			infos.add(getCorrectGameStartInfo(&quot;testname1&quot;, &quot;1.2.3.4&quot;, 10001));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L748">			infos.add(getCorrectGameStartInfo(&quot;testname2&quot;, &quot;1.2.3.4&quot;, 10002));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L749">			infos.add(getCorrectGameStartInfo(&quot;testname3&quot;, &quot;1.2.3.4&quot;, 10003));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L750">			hall.setGameStartInfo(1, infos);</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L752">			JSONObject info1 = hall.getGameStartInfo(&quot;testname1&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L753">			JSONObject info2 = hall.getGameStartInfo(&quot;testname2&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L754">			JSONObject info3 = hall.getGameStartInfo(&quot;testname3&quot;);</span>
			
<span class="fc" id="L756">			JSONArray infoss = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L757">			infoss.add(getCorrectGameFinishInfo(&quot;testname1&quot;, &quot;win&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L758">			infoss.add(getCorrectGameFinishInfo(&quot;testname2&quot;, &quot;lose&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L759">			infoss.add(getCorrectGameFinishInfo(&quot;testname3&quot;, &quot;break&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L760">			hall.setGameFinishedInfo(1, infoss);</span>
			
<span class="pc" id="L762">		} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L763">			fail();</span>
		}
<span class="fc" id="L765">	}</span>

	JSONObject getDetails(String user)
	{
<span class="fc" id="L769">		JSONObject details = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L770">		details.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L771">		details.put(&quot;exp&quot;, 1);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L772">		details.put(&quot;level&quot;, 1);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L773">		details.put(&quot;success&quot;, 0);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L774">		details.put(&quot;fail&quot;, 0);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L775">		details.put(&quot;break&quot;, 0);		</span>
<span class="fc" id="L776">		return details;</span>
	}
	
	JSONObject getCorrectLoginData(String user) {
<span class="fc" id="L780">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L781">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;login&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L782">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L783">		data.put(&quot;details&quot;, getDetails(user));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L784">		return data;</span>
	}

	JSONObject getWrongLoginData(String user) {
<span class="fc" id="L788">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L789">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;login&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L790">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L791">		return data;</span>
	}

	JSONObject getCorrectEnterData(String user, int room, int pos) {
<span class="fc" id="L795">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L796">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;enter&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L797">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L798">		data.put(&quot;room&quot;, room);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L799">		data.put(&quot;pos&quot;, pos);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L800">		return data;</span>
	}

	JSONObject getWrongEnterData(String user) {
<span class="fc" id="L804">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L805">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;enter&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L806">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L807">		return data;</span>
	}

	JSONObject getCorrectLeaveData(String user) {
<span class="fc" id="L811">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L812">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;leave&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L813">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L814">		return data;</span>
	}
	JSONObject getCorrectReadyData(String user) {
<span class="fc" id="L817">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L818">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;ready&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L819">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L820">		return data;</span>
	}
	JSONObject getCorrectUnreadyData(String user) {
<span class="fc" id="L823">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L824">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;unready&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L825">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L826">		return data;</span>
	}
	JSONObject getOtherData(String user) {
<span class="fc" id="L829">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L830">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;other&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L831">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L832">		return data;</span>
	}
	JSONObject getCorrectMessageData(String user, String msg) {
<span class="fc" id="L835">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L836">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;message&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L837">		data.put(&quot;message&quot;, msg);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L838">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L839">		return data;</span>
	}
	JSONObject getWrongMessageData(String user) {
<span class="fc" id="L842">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L843">		data.put(&quot;type&quot;, &quot;message&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L844">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L845">		return data;</span>
	}
	JSONObject getCorrectGameStartInfo(String user, String ip, int port) {
<span class="fc" id="L848">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L849">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L850">		data.put(&quot;ip&quot;, ip);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L851">		data.put(&quot;port&quot;, port);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L852">		return data;		</span>
	}
	JSONObject getCorrectGameFinishInfo(String user, String result) {
<span class="fc" id="L855">		JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L856">		data.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L857">		data.put(&quot;result&quot;, result);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L858">		return data;		</span>
	}
}
```

`documents/Test_docs/Hall/src/default/Log.java.html`:

```html
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="zh"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../../.resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>Log.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../../../.resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="right"><a href="../../../.sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../../../index.html" class="el_report">HallInfoTest (2013-12-14 14:40:45)</a> &gt; <a href="../../index.html" class="el_group">Hall</a> &gt; <a href="../index.html" class="el_bundle">src</a> &gt; <a href="index.html" class="el_package">default</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">Log.java</span></div><h1>Log.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
	
/**.
 * 这个类负责打印调试信息
 */
<span class="nc" id="L7">public class Log {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L8">	static boolean CLIENT_ERR = true;</span>

<span class="fc" id="L10">	static boolean GAME_ERR = true;</span>

<span class="fc" id="L12">	static boolean LOGIN_ERR = true;</span>

<span class="fc" id="L14">	static boolean CLIENT_INFO = true;</span>

<span class="fc" id="L16">	static boolean GAME_INFO = true;</span>

<span class="fc" id="L18">	static boolean LOGIN_INFO = true;</span>

	public final static void log(final String log) {
<span class="fc" id="L21">		System.out.println(log);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L22">	}</span>

	public final static void clientErr(final String type, final Exception e) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L25" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (CLIENT_ERR) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L26">			System.out.println(String.format(&quot;Exception of Client -- %s -- %s&quot;, type, e));</span>
		}
<span class="nc" id="L28">	}</span>

	public final static void gameErr(final String type, final Exception e) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L31" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (GAME_ERR) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L32">			System.out.println(String.format(&quot;Exception of GameServer -- %s -- %s&quot;, type, e));</span>
		}
<span class="nc" id="L34">	}</span>

	public final static void loginErr(final String type, final Exception e) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L37" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (LOGIN_ERR) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L38">			System.out.println(String.format(&quot;Exception of LoginServer -- %s -- %s&quot;, type, e));</span>
		}
<span class="nc" id="L40">	}</span>

	public final static void client(final String log) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L43" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (CLIENT_INFO) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L44">			System.out.println(String.format(&quot;Client -- %s&quot;, log));</span>
		}
<span class="nc" id="L46">	}</span>

	public final static void game(final String log) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L49" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (GAME_INFO) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L50">			System.out.println(String.format(&quot;GameServer -- %s&quot;, log));</span>
		}
<span class="nc" id="L52">	}</span>

	public final static void login(final String log) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L55" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (LOGIN_INFO) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L56">			System.out.println(String.format(&quot;LoginServer -- %s&quot;, log));</span>
		}
<span class="nc" id="L58">	}</span>

	public static void setClientErr(boolean now) {
<span class="nc" id="L61">		CLIENT_ERR = now;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L62">	}</span>

	public static void setGameErr(boolean now) {
<span class="nc" id="L65">		GAME_ERR = now;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L66">	}</span>

	public static void setLoginErr(boolean now) {
<span class="nc" id="L69">		LOGIN_ERR = now;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L70">	}</span>

	public static void setClientInfo(boolean now) {
<span class="nc" id="L73">		CLIENT_INFO = now;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L74">	}</span>

	public static void setGameInfo(boolean now) {
<span class="nc" id="L77">		GAME_INFO = now;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L78">	}</span>

	public static void setLoginInfo(boolean now) {
<span class="nc" id="L81">		LOGIN_INFO = now;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L82">	}</span>
}
```

```html
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="zh"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../../.resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>LoginTalk.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../../../.resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="right"><a href="../../../.sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../../../index.html" class="el_report">HallInfoTest (2013-12-14 14:40:45)</a> &gt; <a href="../../index.html" class="el_group">Hall</a> &gt; <a href="../index.html" class="el_bundle">src</a> &gt; <a href="index.html" class="el_package">default</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">LoginTalk.java</span></div><h1>LoginTalk.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.net.*;
import net.sf.json.*;
	
/**.
 * 这个类负责与登录服务器通信
 */
<span class="nc" id="L9">public class LoginTalk extends Talk {</span>
	/**.
	 * 一个静态方法，负责创建与登录服务器通信的类
	 */
	public static void connectLoginServer(String user, String password, String addr, int port)
	{
<span class="nc" id="L15">		JSONObject information = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L16">		information.put(&quot;user&quot;, user);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L17">		information.put(&quot;password&quot;, password);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L18">		information.put(&quot;ip&quot;, addr);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L19">		information.put(&quot;port&quot;, port);</span>
		try {
<span class="nc" id="L21">			Socket socket = new Socket(Config.LOGIN_ADDR, Config.LOGIN_PORT);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L22">			PrintWriter os = new PrintWriter(socket.getOutputStream());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L23">			Log.login(&quot;Send: &quot; + information.toString());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L24">			os.println(information.toString());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L25">			os.flush();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L26">			Talk.add(&quot;loginServer&quot;, socket, null, os);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L27">		} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L28">			Log.loginErr(&quot;Connect to LoginServer fail&quot;, e);</span>
		}
<span class="nc" id="L30">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 新线程开始运行
	 */
	public void run() {
<span class="nc" id="L36">		Log.log(&quot;Connected to LoginServer&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L37">		timer.schedule(new SubmitTask(), 0, Constant.SUBMIT_PERIOD_FOR_LOGINSERVER);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L38">		int errCount = 0;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L39" title="All 2 branches missed.">		while (runFlag) {</span>
			try {
<span class="nc" id="L41">				String text = is.readLine();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L42" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (!runFlag) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L43">					break;</span>
				}
<span class="nc" id="L45">				Log.login(&quot;Receive: &quot; + text);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L46">				JSONObject data = JSONObject.fromObject(text);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L47">				data.put(&quot;timestamp&quot;, System.currentTimeMillis());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L48">				data.put(&quot;status&quot;, &quot;online&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L49">				String user = data.getString(&quot;user&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L50">				synchronized (clientConnection) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L51" title="All 4 branches missed.">					if (!clientConnection.has(user) || clientConnection.getJSONObject(user).getString(&quot;status&quot;).equals(&quot;offline&quot;)) </span>
<span class="nc" id="L52">						clientConnection.put(user, data);</span>
				}
<span class="nc" id="L54">			} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L55">				Log.loginErr(&quot;Connection&quot;, e);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L56" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (errCount++ &gt; 2) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L57">					break;</span>
				}
			}
		}
<span class="nc" id="L61">		stop();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L62">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 这个类负责向登录服务器发送用户资料
	 */
<span class="nc" id="L67">	class SubmitTask extends TimerTask {</span>
		public void run() {
			try {
<span class="nc" id="L70">				JSONArray userData = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L71">				int count = 0;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L72">				synchronized (clientConnection) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L73">					Set set = clientConnection.keySet();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L74">					Iterator iter = set.iterator();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L75" title="All 2 branches missed.">					while (iter.hasNext()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L76">						String user = (String)iter.next();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L77">						JSONObject connection = clientConnection.getJSONObject(user);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L78" title="All 2 branches missed.">						if (connection.getString(&quot;status&quot;).equals(&quot;online&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L79">							long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L80">							JSONObject data = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L81">							data.put(&quot;user&quot;, connection.getString(&quot;user&quot;));</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L82" title="All 2 branches missed.">							if (connection.getLong(&quot;timestamp&quot;) + Constant.TIME_LIMIT_FOR_CLIENT &lt; currentTime) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L83">								connection.put(&quot;status&quot;, &quot;offline&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L84">								data.put(&quot;status&quot;, &quot;offline&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L85" title="All 2 branches missed.">								if (connection.has(&quot;details&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L86">                                                                        data.put(&quot;details&quot;, connection.getJSONObject(&quot;details&quot;));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L87">                                                                } else {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L88">                                                                        data.put(&quot;details&quot;, hall.getDetails(user));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L89">								        hall.logout(user);</span>
                                                                }
							
<span class="nc" id="L92">                                                        } else {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L93">								count ++;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L94">								data.put(&quot;status&quot;, &quot;online&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L95" title="All 2 branches missed.">								if (connection.has(&quot;details&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L96">                                                                        data.put(&quot;details&quot;, connection.getJSONObject(&quot;details&quot;));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L97">                                                                } else {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L98">                                                                        data.put(&quot;details&quot;, hall.getDetails(user));</span>
                                                                }
							}
<span class="nc" id="L101">							userData.add(data);</span>
						}
					}
				}
<span class="nc" id="L105">				JSONObject result = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L106">				result.put(&quot;userData&quot;, userData);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L107">				result.put(&quot;limit&quot;, Constant.HALL_LIMIT - count);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L108">				os.println(result.toString());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L109">				os.flush();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L110">				Log.login(&quot;Send: &quot; + result);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L111">			} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L112">				Log.loginErr(&quot;SubmitTask: &quot;, e);</span>
			}
<span class="nc" id="L114">		}</span>
	}

	protected void stop() {
<span class="nc" id="L118">		Log.log(&quot;HallServer stop&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L119">		super.stop();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L120">	}</span>
}
```

```html
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="zh"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../../.resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>Main.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../../../.resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="right"><a href="../../../.sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../../../index.html" class="el_report">HallInfoTest (2013-12-14 14:40:45)</a> &gt; <a href="../../index.html" class="el_group">Hall</a> &gt; <a href="../index.html" class="el_bundle">src</a> &gt; <a href="index.html" class="el_package">default</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">Main.java</span></div><h1>Main.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">import java.util.*;

import net.sf.json.JSONArray;
import net.sf.json.JSONObject;

/**.
 * 大厅的主类
 * @author qianqiao
 */

<span class="nc" id="L11">public class Main {</span>
	/**.
	 * 启动大厅的入口函数
	 */
	public static void main(String args[]) {
<span class="nc" id="L16">		Log.log(&quot;Hello world! I'm Hall Server!&quot;);</span>

<span class="nc" id="L18">		Gate gameServerGate = new Gate();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L19">		gameServerGate.start(&quot;gameServer&quot;, Config.THREAD_FOR_GAMESERVER, Config.MY_PORT_FOR_GAMESERVER);</span>

<span class="nc" id="L21">		LoginTalk.connectLoginServer(Config.MY_USERNAME, Config.MY_PASSWORD, Config.MY_ADDR, Config.MY_PORT_FOR_CLIENT);</span>

<span class="nc" id="L23">		Gate clientGate = new Gate();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L24">		clientGate.start(&quot;client&quot;, Config.THREAD_FOR_CLIENT, Config.MY_PORT_FOR_CLIENT);</span>

<span class="nc" id="L26">		manage();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L27">	}</span>
	/**.
	 * 通过该函数可以手工控制大厅。具体地讲，该函数支持屏幕输入以下命令来管理大厅：
	 * 1） client close 停止输出与客户端之间的通信内容
	 * 2） client open  输出与客户端的通信内容
	 * 3） login close  停止输出与登录服务器之间的通信内容
	 * 4） login open   输出与客户端之间的通信内容
	 * 5） game close   停止输出与游戏服务器之间的通信内容
	 * 6） game open    输出与游戏服务器之间的通信内容
	 * 7） status       查看当前大厅状态
	 * 8） {JSONObject} 执行一个用户操作。具体格式详见大厅的接口函数。
	 */
	private static void manage() {
<span class="nc" id="L40">		HallInfo hall = HallInfo.getInstance();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L41">		Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L42">		int count = 0;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L43">		while (true) {</span>
			try {
<span class="nc" id="L45">				String text = scanner.nextLine();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L46" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;status&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L47">					JSONObject ans = hall.getStatus();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L48">					System.out.println(ans);</span>
				}
				
<span class="nc bnc" id="L51" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;events&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L52">					JSONObject ans = hall.getEvents(count);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L53">					count = ans.getInt(&quot;count&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L54">					System.out.println(String.format(&quot;count = %d&quot;, count));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L55">					JSONArray result = ans.getJSONArray(&quot;events&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L56" title="All 2 branches missed.">					if (result != null) System.out.println(result.toString());</span>
				}

<span class="nc bnc" id="L59" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;game open&quot;)) Log.setGameInfo(true);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L60" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;game close&quot;)) Log.setGameInfo(false);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L61" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;client open&quot;)) Log.setClientInfo(true);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L62" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;client close&quot;)) Log.setClientInfo(false);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L63" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;login open&quot;)) Log.setLoginInfo(true);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L64" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;login close&quot;)) Log.setLoginInfo(false);</span>

<span class="nc bnc" id="L66" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;game err open&quot;)) Log.setGameErr(true);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L67" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;game err close&quot;)) Log.setGameErr(false);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L68" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;client err open&quot;)) Log.setClientErr(true);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L69" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;client err close&quot;)) Log.setClientErr(false);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L70" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;login err open&quot;)) Log.setLoginErr(true);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L71" title="All 2 branches missed.">				if (text.equals(&quot;login err close&quot;)) Log.setLoginErr(false);</span>
				
<span class="nc bnc" id="L73" title="All 4 branches missed.">				if (text.startsWith(&quot;{&quot;) &amp;&amp; text.endsWith(&quot;}&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L74">					JSONObject json = JSONObject.fromObject(text);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L75">					hall.execute(json);</span>
				}
<span class="nc" id="L77">			} catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L78">				System.out.println(&quot;Manage error -- &quot; + e);</span>
			}
		}
	}
}
```

```html
import java.io.*;
import java.net.*;
import net.sf.json.*;
	
public class Room {
	/**.
	 * 该房间中每个位置的用户id
	 */
	private String[] users;

	/**.
	 * 该房间中每个位置的状态
	 */
	private int[] status;
	public final static int EMPTY = 0;
	public final static int UNREADY = 1;
	public final static int READY = 2;

	/**.
	 * 该房间的状态
	 */
	private int stage;

	public final static int WAITING = 0;
	public final static int ALLREADY = 1;
	public final static int PLAYING = 2;

	/**.
	 * 该房间每个位置的用户加入游戏服务器的一次性口令
	 */
	private String[] key;

	/**.
	 * 该房间每个位置的用户加入游戏服务器的ip地址
	 */
	private String[] ip;

	/**.
	 * 该房间每个位置的用户加入游戏服务器的端口号
	 */
	private int[] port;

	/**.
	 * 该房间的编号
	 */
	private int num;

	/**.
	 * 该房间内的聊天记录
	 */
	private JSONArray[] msg;

<span class="fc" id="L54">	Room(int _num) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L55">		users =  new String[Constant.ROOM_LIMIT];</span>
<span class="fc" id="L56">		status = new int[Constant.ROOM_LIMIT];</span>
<span class="fc" id="L57">		key = new String[Constant.ROOM_LIMIT];</span>
<span class="fc" id="L58">		ip = new String[Constant.ROOM_LIMIT];</span>
<span class="fc" id="L59">		port = new int[Constant.ROOM_LIMIT];</span>
<span class="fc" id="L60">		num = _num;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L61">		msg = new JSONArray[Constant.ROOM_LIMIT];</span>

<span class="fc" id="L65">			msg[i] = new JSONArray();</span>
		}
<span class="fc" id="L67">		stage = WAITING;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L68">    }</span>

	/**.
	 * 获取该房间内的一个空位编号，若没有则返回-1
	 */
	public int getEmpty() {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L74" title="All 2 branches covered.">		for (int i = 0; i &lt; status.length; i++) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L75" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (status[i] == EMPTY) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L76">				return i;</span>
			}
		}
<span class="fc" id="L79">		return -1;</span>
	}

	/**.
	 * 查询该房间内一个位置的状态
	 */
	public int getStatus(int pos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L86">		return status[pos];</span>
	}

	/**.
	 * 查询该房间内一个位置的用户名称
	 */
	public String getUser(int pos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L93">		return users[pos];</span>
	}

	/**.
	 * 用户user进入该房间的pos号座位
	 */
	public void enter(int pos, String user) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L100">		users[pos] = user;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">		status[pos] = UNREADY;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L102">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 用户user离开该房间
	 */
	public void leave(int pos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L108">		users[pos] = &quot;&quot;;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L109">		status[pos] = EMPTY;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L110">		msg[pos] = new JSONArray();</span>
		
<span class="fc" id="L112">		boolean flag = true;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L113" title="All 2 branches covered.">		for (int i=0; i&lt;status.length; i++)</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L114" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">			if (status[i] != EMPTY) flag = false;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L115" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">		if (flag) stage = WAITING;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L116">	}</span>
	
	/**.
	 * 在pos号位置的用户准备
	 */
	public void ready(int pos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L122">		status[pos] = READY;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L123">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 在pos号位置的用户取消准备
	 */
	public void unready(int pos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L129">		status[pos] = UNREADY;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L130">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 判断房间内所有用户是否都已准备
	 */
	public boolean isReady() {
<span class="fc" id="L136">		int count = 0;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L137" title="All 2 branches covered.">		for (int i = 0; i &lt; Constant.ROOM_LIMIT; i++) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L138" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (status[i] == READY) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L139">				count++;</span>
			}
<span class="fc bfc" id="L141" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (status[i] == UNREADY) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L142">				return false;</span>
			}
		}
<span class="fc bfc" id="L145" title="All 2 branches covered.">		return count &gt; 1;</span>
	}

	/**.
	 * 获取房间的状态
	 */
	public int getStage() {
<span class="fc" id="L152">		return stage;</span>
	}

	/**.
	 * 设置房间的状态
	 */
	public void setStage(int _stage) {
<span class="fc" id="L159">		stage = _stage;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L160">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 获取pos号位置用户的key
	 */
	String getKey(int pos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L166">		return key[pos];</span>
	}

	/**.
	 * 设置pos号位置用户的key
	 */
	public void setKey(int pos, String _key) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L173">		key[pos] = _key;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L174">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 获取pos号位置用户的ip
	 */
	String getIp(int pos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L180">		return ip[pos];</span>
	}

	/**.

	int getPort(int pos) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L187">		return port[pos];</span>
	}

	/**.
	 * 设置pos号位置用户的ip和port
	 */
	void setAddr(int pos, String _ip, int _port) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L194">		ip[pos] = _ip;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L195">		port[pos] = _port;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L196">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 获取房间编号
	 */
	public int getNum() {
<span class="fc" id="L202">		return num;</span>
	}
	
	/**.
	 * 添加聊天记录
	 */
	public void addMessage(int pos, String message) throws Exception
	{
<span class="fc" id="L210">		JSONObject m = new JSONObject();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L211">		m.put(&quot;speaker&quot;, users[pos]);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L212">		m.put(&quot;message&quot;, message);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L213" title="All 2 branches covered.">		for (int i=0; i&lt;msg.length; i++)</span>
		{
<span class="fc bfc" id="L215" title="All 2 branches covered.">			if (status[i] != EMPTY)</span>
			{
<span class="fc" id="L217">				msg[i].add(m);</span>
			}
		}
<span class="fc" id="L220">	}</span>
	
	/**.
	 * 获取聊天记录
	 */
	public JSONArray getMessages(int pos) throws Exception
	{
<span class="fc" id="L227">		JSONArray messages = msg[pos];</span>
<span class="fc" id="L228">		msg[pos] = new JSONArray();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L229">		return messages;</span>
	}
}
```

```html
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="zh"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../../../.resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>Talk.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../.resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../../../.resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="right"><a href="../../../.sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../../../index.html" class="el_report">HallInfoTest (2013-12-14 14:40:45)</a> &gt; <a href="../../index.html" class="el_group">Hall</a> &gt; <a href="../index.html" class="el_bundle">src</a> &gt; <a href="index.html" class="el_package">default</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">Talk.java</span></div><h1>Talk.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.net.*;
import net.sf.json.*;
	
/**.
 * 这个类负责通信。它是一个纯虚类，派生类有：
 * 		1） LoginTalk   负责与登录服务器通信
 * 		2） GameTalk    负责与游戏服务器通信
 * 		3） GlientTalk  负责与客户端通信
 */
<span class="nc" id="L12">public abstract class Talk implements Runnable {</span>
	/**.
	 * 与游戏服务器通信的相关信息
	 */
<span class="fc" id="L16">	protected static JSONObject gameServerConnection = Constant.getGameServerConnection();</span>

	/**.
	 * 与客户端通信的相关信息
	 */
<span class="fc" id="L21">	protected static JSONObject clientConnection = new JSONObject();</span>

	/**.
	 * 大厅
	 */
<span class="fc" id="L26">	protected static HallInfo hall = HallInfo.getInstance();</span>

	/**.
	 * 通信的socket
	 */
	protected Socket socket;

	/**.
	 * 监听线程
	 */
	protected Thread thread;

	/**.
	 * 读入缓存
	 */
	protected BufferedReader is;

	/**.
	 * 输出缓存
	 */
	protected PrintWriter os;

	/**.
	 * 经常用到的计时器
	 */
<span class="nc" id="L51">	protected Timer timer = new Timer();</span>

	/**.
	 * 线程是否还在运行的flag
	 */
<span class="nc" id="L56">	protected boolean runFlag = true;</span>

	/**.
	 * 使用工厂方法构造一个通信线程
	 */
	public static void add(String type, Socket socket, BufferedReader is, PrintWriter os) {
<span class="nc" id="L62">		Talk talk = null;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L63" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (type.equals(&quot;client&quot;)) talk = new ClientTalk();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L64" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (type.equals(&quot;loginServer&quot;)) talk = new LoginTalk();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L65" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (type.equals(&quot;gameServer&quot;)) talk = new GameTalk();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L66" title="All 2 branches missed.">		if (talk != null) talk.start(socket, is, os);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L67">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 入口函数，配置好各种信息
	 */
	public void start(Socket _socket, BufferedReader _is, PrintWriter _os) {
		try {
<span class="nc" id="L74">			socket = _socket;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L75">			is = _is;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L76">			os = _os;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L77" title="All 2 branches missed.">			if (is == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L78">				is = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(socket.getInputStream()));</span>
			}
<span class="nc bnc" id="L80" title="All 2 branches missed.">			if (os == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L81">				os = new PrintWriter(socket.getOutputStream());</span>
			}
<span class="nc" id="L83">			runFlag = true;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L84">			thread = new Thread(this);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L85">			thread.start();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L86">		} catch (Exception e) {</span>
		}
<span class="nc" id="L88">	}</span>

	/**.
	 * 线程运行的函数
	 */
	public abstract void run();

	/**.
	 * 停止线程的方法
	 */
	protected void stop() {
<span class="nc" id="L99">		timer.cancel();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L100">		runFlag = false;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L101">		thread = null;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L102">	}</span>
}
```

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    package="com.example.client"
    android:versionCode="1"
    android:versionName="1.0" >

    <uses-sdk
        android:minSdkVersion="8"
        android:targetSdkVersion="17" />

    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />

    <application
        android:allowBackup="true"
        android:icon="@drawable/ic_launcher"
        android:label="@string/app_name"
        android:theme="@style/AppTheme" >
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.MainActivity"
            android:label="@string/app_name" >
            <intent-filter>
                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />

                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
            </intent-filter>
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.GameActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_game" >
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.LoginActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_login" >
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.HallActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_hall" >
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.RoomActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_room" >
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.RegActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_reg" >
        </activity>
    </application>

</manifest>
```

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    package="com.example.client"
    android:versionCode="1"
    android:versionName="1.0" >

    <uses-sdk
        android:minSdkVersion="8"
        android:targetSdkVersion="17" />

    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />

    <application
        android:allowBackup="true"
        android:icon="@drawable/ic_launcher"
        android:label="@string/app_name"
        android:theme="@style/AppTheme" >
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.MainActivity"
            android:label="@string/app_name" >
            <intent-filter>
                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />

                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
            </intent-filter>
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.GameActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_game" >
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.LoginActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_login" >
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.HallActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_hall" >
        </activity>
        <activity
            android:name="com.example.client.view.myView.RoomActivity"
            android:label="@string/title_activity_room" >
        </activity>

            android:label="@string/title_activity_reg" >

</manifest>
```

`src/qqtang_client/res/layout/activity_reg.xml`:

```xml
<merge xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    tools:context=".RegActivity" >

    <!-- Login progress -->

    <LinearLayout
        android:id="@+id/login_status"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_gravity="center"
        android:gravity="center_horizontal"
        android:orientation="vertical"
        android:visibility="gone" >

        <ProgressBar
            style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleLarge"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/login_status_message"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
            android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light"
            android:text="@string/login_progress_signing_in"
            android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />
    </LinearLayout>

    <!-- Login form -->

    <ScrollView
        android:id="@+id/login_form"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent" >

        <LinearLayout
            style="@style/LoginFormContainer"
            android:layout_height="400dp"
            android:orientation="vertical" >

            <EditText
                android:id="@+id/reg_username"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:hint="@string/username"
                android:inputType="text|textEmailAddress"
                android:maxLines="1"
                android:singleLine="true" />

            <EditText
                android:id="@+id/nickname"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:ems="10"
                android:hint="nickname"
                android:inputType="text|textEmailAddress"
                android:maxLines="1"
                android:singleLine="true" />

            <EditText
                android:id="@+id/reg_password"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:hint="@string/prompt_password"
                android:imeActionId="@+id/login"
                android:imeActionLabel="@string/action_sign_in_short"
                android:imeOptions="actionUnspecified"
                android:inputType="textPassword"
                android:maxLines="1"
                android:singleLine="true" />

            <EditText
                android:id="@+id/reg_repassword"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:ems="10"
                android:hint="@string/prompt_password"
                android:imeActionId="@+id/login"
                android:imeActionLabel="@string/action_sign_in_short"
                android:imeOptions="actionUnspecified"
                android:inputType="textPassword"
                android:maxLines="1"
                android:singleLine="true" >

                <requestFocus />
            </EditText>

            <Button
                android:id="@+id/reg_button"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
                android:paddingLeft="32dp"
                android:paddingRight="32dp"
                android:text="@string/register" />

            <Button
                android:id="@+id/reg_return"
                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
                android:paddingLeft="32dp"
                android:paddingRight="32dp"
                android:text="return" />

        </LinearLayout>
    </ScrollView>

</merge>

```

```xml
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
    tools:context=".RoomActivity" >

    <TextView
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/hello_world" />
	<com.example.client.view.myWidgets.MyText
        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:paddingLeft="100dp"
        android:text=""
        android:id="@+id/test"
        />
</RelativeLayout>
```

```xml
<FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:background="@drawable/loginground"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    tools:context=".Room2Activity" >
    

    <!--
         The primary full-screen view. This can be replaced with whatever view
         is needed to present your content, e.g. VideoView, SurfaceView,
         TextureView, etc.
    -->

    <!--
         This FrameLayout insets its children based on system windows using
         android:fitsSystemWindows.
    -->

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent" >

        <LinearLayout
            android:layout_width="208dp"
            android:layout_height="match_parent" >
			
            <LinearLayout

                android:orientation="vertical"

                <LinearLayout
```

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>

    <!--
        Base application theme for API 11+. This theme completely replaces
        AppBaseTheme from res/values/styles.xml on API 11+ devices.
    -->
    <style name="AppBaseTheme" parent="android:Theme.Holo.Light">
        <!-- API 11 theme customizations can go here. -->
    </style>

    <style name="FullscreenActionBarStyle" parent="android:Widget.Holo.ActionBar">
        <item name="android:background">@color/black_overlay</item>
    </style>

    <style name="FullscreenTheme" parent="android:Theme.Holo">
        <item name="android:actionBarStyle">@style/FullscreenActionBarStyle</item>
        <item name="android:windowActionBarOverlay">true</item>
        <item name="android:windowBackground">@null</item>
        <item name="buttonBarStyle">?android:attr/buttonBarStyle</item>
        <item name="buttonBarButtonStyle">?android:attr/buttonBarButtonStyle</item>
    </style>

</resources>
```

```xml
    <!--
        Base application theme for API 14+. This theme completely replaces
        AppBaseTheme from BOTH res/values/styles.xml and
        res/values-v11/styles.xml on API 14+ devices.
    -->
    <style name="AppBaseTheme" parent="android:Theme.Holo.Light.DarkActionBar">
        <!-- API 14 theme customizations can go here. -->
    </style>

</resources>
```

`src/qqtang_client/res/values/attrs.xml`:

```xml
<resources>

    <!--
         Declare custom theme attributes that allow changing which styles are
         used for button bars depending on the API level.
         ?android:attr/buttonBarStyle is new as of API 11 so this is
         necessary to support previous API levels.
    -->
    <declare-styleable name="ButtonBarContainerTheme">
        <attr name="buttonBarStyle" format="reference" />
        <attr name="buttonBarButtonStyle" format="reference" />
    </declare-styleable>

</resources>
```

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>

    <string name="app_name">QQTan</string>
    <string name="action_settings">Settings</string>
    <string name="hello_world">Hello world!</string>
    <string name="title_activity_game">GameActivity</string>
    <string name="title_activity_login">LoginActivity</string>
    <string name="title_activity_hall">HallActivity</string>
    <string name="title_activity_room">RoomActivity</string>
    <string name="title_activity_reg">RegActivity</string>
    <string name="register">register</string>
    <string name="username">username</string>

    <!-- Strings related to login -->
    <string name="prompt_email">Email</string>
    <string name="prompt_password">Password</string>
    <string name="action_sign_in_register"><b>Sign in</b> or register</string>
    <string name="action_sign_in_short">Sign in</string>
    <string name="action_forgot_password">Recover lost password</string>
    <string name="login_progress_signing_in">Signing in&#8230;</string>
    <string name="error_invalid_email">This email address is invalid</string>
    <string name="error_invalid_password">This password is too short</string>
    <string name="error_incorrect_password">This password is incorrect</string>
    <string name="error_field_required">This field is required</string>
    <string name="dummy_content">DUMMY\nCONTENT</string>
    <string name="dummy_button">Dummy Button</string>
```

`src/qqtang_client/res/values/styles.xml`:

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>

    <!--
        Base application theme, dependent on API level. This theme is replaced
        by AppBaseTheme from res/values-vXX/styles.xml on newer devices.
    -->
    <style name="AppBaseTheme" parent="android:Theme.Light">
        <!--
            Theme customizations available in newer API levels can go in
            res/values-vXX/styles.xml, while customizations related to
            backward-compatibility can go here.
        -->
    </style>

    <!-- Application theme. -->
    <style name="AppTheme" parent="AppBaseTheme">
        <!-- All customizations that are NOT specific to a particular API-level can go here. -->
    </style>

    <style name="LoginFormContainer">
        <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item>
        <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
        <item name="android:padding">16dp</item>
    </style>

    <style name="ButtonBarButton" />

    <style name="ButtonBar">
        <item name="android:paddingLeft">2dp</item>
        <item name="android:paddingTop">5dp</item>
        <item name="android:paddingRight">2dp</item>
        <item name="android:paddingBottom">0dp</item>
        <item name="android:background">@android:drawable/bottom_bar</item>
    </style>

    <style name="FullscreenTheme" parent="android:Theme.NoTitleBar">
        <item name="android:windowContentOverlay">@null</item>
        <item name="android:windowBackground">@null</item>
        <item name="buttonBarStyle">@style/ButtonBar</item>
        <item name="buttonBarButtonStyle">@style/ButtonBarButton</item>
    </style>

</resources>
```

`src/qqtang_client/src/com/example/client/controller/Controller.java`:

```java
package com.example.client.controller;

import org.json.JSONException;
import org.json.JSONObject;

import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
import android.os.Handler;
import android.os.Message;
import android.util.Log;

import com.example.client.model.Config;
import com.example.client.model.Flag;
import com.example.client.model.GameModel;
import com.example.client.model.HallModel;
import com.example.client.model.SigninModel;
import com.example.client.model.SignupModel;


/**
 * <p>This class is the controller part of the MVC design pattern,
 * and it also completes the singletom design pattern, any viewer
 * or model could get the instance of controller via the static
 * method getController().</p>
 * 
 * <p>This class control all the logic parts of this software, 
 * corresponding with viewer's request, drive models to handle
 * these requests, and control the software work status transfer
 * during its running.</p>
 * 
 * <p>author: 	Piasy Xu</p>
 * <p>date:		21:25 2013/12/11</p>
 * <p>email:	xz4215@gmail.com</p>
 * <p>github:	Piasy</p>
 * */
public class Controller
{
	private static int instanceCount = 0;
	private static Controller instance;
	
	SigninModel signinModel = null;
	HallModel hallModel = null;
	GameModel gameModel = null;
	Handler viewerHandler = null;
	Thread controllerThread = null;
	
	Flag signinFlag, enterFlag, leaveFlag, readyFlag, unreadyFlag, signoutFlag;
	boolean keepRunning = true;
	
	/**
	 * This method will return the sigletom instance
	 * of controller, all viewers or models will get the
	 * same controller, no matter when and where they call
	 * this method.
	 * @param none
	 * @return the only instance of controller
	 * */
	public static Controller getController()
	{
		if (instanceCount == 0)
		{
			instance = new Controller();
			instanceCount ++;
		}
		Log.d(Config.LOG_TAG, "controller ref at : " + instance + " , count : " + instanceCount);
		
		return instance;
	}
	
	String hallIP = "", gameIP = "";
	int hallPort, gamePort;
	String key = "";
	String gameKey = "";

	String username = "";	
	/**
```
